string.text: Anti-radiation drugs

Mexaminum radiation protection drugs are common in the Zone. When used, this drug induces contraction of peripheral blood vessels and oxygen deprivation, which serve to treat and prevent radiation exposure. The drug does not have severe side effects, although isolated cases of mild nausea, dizziness, cramps and stomach pain have been reported.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]HEALING:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Depletes 5%hp on use
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
Bandage

A normal elastic bandage used to stop bleeding and prevent infection of wounds. For regular bleeding, carefully apply the bandage to the wound. For arterial bleeding, urgently tie the bandage around the affected area.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] first-aid item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (adhesive plaster)
Vinca

Ukrainian Vikasolum - an artificial equivalent of vitamin K. The main purpose of this drug is to increase blood coagulation speed. In great demand among stalkers who want slow-healing wounds and lacerations inflicted by mutants to close up faster. The effects of the drug are long-lasting. Take two tablets at a time.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes dizziness
Anabiotics

An experimental drug developed by Professor Ozersky for scientific research teams working in the Zone. At its core, the drug contains tetrodotoxin, known colloquially as "zombie powder," which causes a complete shutdown of the body's central nervous system that may allow people to survive emissions outside cover. After six years worth of field tests, thoughtful stalkers know to keep a few on hand for unexpected blowouts.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] zone-produced
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes temporary blackout
Psy-block

A drug that blocks avalanche-like nerve impulses. Consumption induces short-term loss of all emotion. Used exclusively in the Zone to counteract the effects of anomalous psy-fields. The effects of the drug are long-lasting. Take two tablets at a time.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes extreme dizziness
Antidote

The IP2 antitoxin is a complex drug comprising several antidotes, including metoclopramidum, pyridoxine, thiamine, riboxin and other pharmaceuticals. The drug is used to inject a range of antibiotics to neutralise natural poisons, together with synthetic poison absorbers, into the bloodstream. IP2 is not particularly popular in the Zone as most stalkers rely on a gas mask and a protective suit. However, there are still those who have a few units of this antidote stashed for emergency situations. The effects of the drug are long-lasting. Take one capsule at a time.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes dizziness
Hercules

The main component of this product is an anabolic androgen, an artificial steroid, the chemical composition of which resembles testosterone. Often used by stalkers during long raids to reduce muscle fatigue. Significantly increases weight-carrying capacity. The effects of the drug are long-lasting.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
Radioprotectant

B190 Indraline radioprotectant, included in medkits issued to nuclear power plant personnel. Used in the Zone instead of the excessively toxic PC1 cysteamine hydrochloride, repeated use of which often caused death. Reduces the effects of gamma radiation on live tissue. Best consumed before exposure, as effects are not instant, but the drug lasts a long time. Take one capsule at a time.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild dizziness
Akvatabs

Small plastic bag with pills intended for disinfecting water containing harmful bacteria and viruses. Use two tablets at a time.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (dispersible tablets)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Basic medical package

A medical package containing a variety of equipment for treatment of minor injuries.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]CONTENTS:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] bandage (4)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] diclofenac sodium
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] improvised stimpack
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] metamizole ampoule
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] mineral water
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] sulfadimethoxine
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] tourniquet
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] yadulin
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] storage for medical equipment
Army medical package

A military-grade medical package, containing a large amount of stimulating medical drugs.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]CONTENTS:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] ampoule of morphine
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] anti-radiaton preparation
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] aquatab tablets
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] bandage (4)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] caffeine tablets
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] diclofenac sodium
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] harness (2)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] military stimulant
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] mineral water
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] 027 R pill
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] tetanus vaccine
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] storage for medical equipment
Scientific medical package

A medical package, designed for use specifically in the Zone. It contains a large amount of drugs for the purposes of countering chemical, psy- and radioactive hazards.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]CONTENTS:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] anti-radiation drugs (2)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] antioxidant IP2
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] big glucose shot
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] cystamine (2)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] diclofenac sodium
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] epinephrine
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] harness
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] indralin-B190
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] mineral water
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] psi-block
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] scientific stimulant (2)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] sulfadimethoxine
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] storage for medical equipment
Diclofenac sodium

Non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug from the group of phenylacetic acid derivatives. The effect of the drug dulls the user's nervous activity. Because of the huge number of side effects, such as headache, dizziness, drowsiness, and in some cases memory disorders, disorientation, irritability, it is not used for medicinal purposes in most countries. However, in the Zone it has become popular due to a side effect expressed in violation of the sensitivity of the central nervous system, which allows it to withstand severe injuries, such as gunshot and shrapnel wounds.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]HEALING:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Restores 2%hp on use
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Restores 0.05%hp/s, total 50%
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] average damage resistance bonus
Tourniquet

A haemostatic rubber tourniquet, allowing the user to stop bleeding.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] first-aid item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (tourniquet)
Yadulin

A semi-drug based on morphine. It allows the user to quickly dull pain and increase production of adrenaline, aiding the user in withstanding even the most intense battles. It is popular among stalkers, often used as a recreative drug among criminal groups, and is allegedly being supplied to the Monolith.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]HEALING:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Restores 0.12%hp/s, total 30%
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] agonistic effect
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes a short-term clouding of consciousness
First-aid kit

A general purpose medical kit. Handy for treating injuries, wounds, chemical and thermal burns and various types of poisoning.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]HEALING:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Restores 1.8%hp/s, total 60%
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (field kit)
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] prolonged body recovery time
Army medkit

A specialised medical kit for providing first aid to combat casualties. The kit includes blood coagulants based on menadione, painkillers, antibiotics and immunostimulants, as well as a kit for removing bullets and fragments from the body. This medkit is issued primarily to army personnel such as Spetsnaz units venturing deep into the Zone and is popular among Duty forces.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]HEALING:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Restores 3%hp/s, total 100%
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (field kit)
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] prolonged body recovery time
Scientific medkit

A medical kit designed specifically for use in the Zone. The kit contains products for handling wounds, as well as preventing the development of radiation poisoning and reducing accumulated radiation in the body. Contains Vikasolum, Batilolum and Naphazoline, unlike other medkits.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]HEALING:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Restores 3%hp/s, total 100%
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (field kit)
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] prolonged body recovery time
Small glucose shot

Glucose shots are used in cases of severe diabetic hypoglycaemia, but can also be employed as a stimulant. Instant induction of carbohydrates entails a rapid boost of energy, thus allowing the user to undertake increased physical effort and withstand stress. Due to its convenient means of administration, they can be used in combat situations. This makes glucose shot a very good way to speed-up the healing process.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
Large glucose shot

Glucose shots are used in cases of severe diabetic hypoglycaemia, but can also be employed as a stimulant. Instant induction of carbohydrates entails a rapid boost of energy, thus allowing the user to undertake increased physical effort and withstand stress. Due to its convenient means of administration, they can be used in combat situations. This makes glucose shot a very good way to speed-up the healing process.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
Improvised stimpack

Improvised stimpacks are popular among novice Zoners as they are easy to obtain and inexpensive. Produced in the Zone from commonly available ingredients, without proper equipment and purification. This is the cause of many side effects which include headache, paraesthesia and considerable increase in nutrition demand. Injected in the thigh.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]HEALING:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Restores 4.2%hp/s, total 50%
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] zone-produced
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] moderate body recovery time
Military stimpack

Military stims constitute a part of standard-issue soldier equipment for field operations in the Zone... in theory. In practice, most grunts never see these stims. Meanwhile, they're available with suspicious ease on the black market and can be acquired by most stalkers for a moderate price. Popular among experienced Zoners. They are significantly more potent and faster working than their improvised counterparts, which makes them perfect for use in life-threatening situations. Produced from raw agents of high density which can take their toll on the body. Side effects include extreme dizziness and increased hunger.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]HEALING:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Restores 6%hp/s, total 90%
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast body recovery time
Scientific stimpack

Created by the same defence research institute in Kiev which developed the well-known SEVA suit, this state-of-the-art solution constitutes the most potent health stabiliser available in the Zone. Best quality ingredients and perfected formula enable almost instant recuperation and ensure prompt radiation cleansing. Side effects are minimised. Extremely high cost practically limits the target group of the drug to most skilful and successful stalkers.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]HEALING:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Restores 6%hp/s, total 90%
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] rapid body recovery time
027 R pills

A package of alprazolam 0.25 mg tablets, also known as 027 R. Alprazolam is known among chemists for its ability to reduce depression, anxiety and panic disorders. Invaluable for anyone exploring Yantar, Radar, the Red Forest or any of the underground labs. Side effects include sleepiness. Best taken with water, but some stalkers opt for caffeine instead.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] immediate sleepiness induction
Cocaine

Small aluminium case containing cocaine and the tools facilitating use. Cocaine is a powerfully addictive stimulant that drastically increases happiness, energy and alertness in the brain when taken, along with extreme irritability and paranoia leading to violent moodswings.
 
The long term effects include loss of appetite, disease vulnerability, psychosis and the erosion of mouth and lungs. For stalkers who expect to live an especially short or violent life regardless, the negatives are an acceptable tradeoff for the heigtened euphoria and combat performance granted by this drug's effects. Bandits are rumoured to be the biggest suppliers of cocaine in the Zone, with renegades being their primary customers.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]HEALING:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Depletes 6%hp on use
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] very potent alcohol sobering effect
Epinephrine shot

Epinephrine (also known as adrenalin) is a hormone and a neurotransmitter. Epinephrine has many functions in the body, instantly regulating heart rate, blood vessel and air passage diameters, and metabolic shifts. Epinephrine release is a crucial component of the fight-or-flight response of the sympathetic nervous system. The effects lead to increased blood glucose and fatty acids, providing substrates for instant energy production within cells throughout the body.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] very potent alcohol sobering effect
Morphine ampoule

An iron ampoule designed as field equipment for military field personnel for instant pain reduction. This ampoule contains a powerful dose of morphine. In clinical medicine, morphine is regarded as the gold standard of opioid analgesics used to relieve severe or agonizing pain and suffering. Like other opioids, such as oxycodone, hydromorphone, and diacetylmorphine (heroin), morphine acts directly on the central nervous system (CNS) to relieve pain. Injected into an arm or a thigh.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]HEALING:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Restores 10%hp on use
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] large damage resistance bonus
Metamizole ampoule

An iron ampoule designed as field equipment for military field personnel for instant pain reduction. It contains a powerful dose of metamizole mixed with an antihemorrhagic drug. Metamizole is one of the strongest Non-Steroidal Anti-Inflammatory Drugs (NSAIDs), especially effective at easing aches and pains as well as reducing fevers. It is also useful as anti-inflammatory drug when used in higher doses. May cause some delayed side effects such as leucopenia or agranulocytosis, so it should be used with moderation. Injected into an arm or a thigh. Its availability in the Zone is limited due to the difficulty of smuggling the medicine across military cordons.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]HEALING:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Restores 10%hp on use
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] moderate damage resistance bonus
Caffeine tablets

Caffeine and sodium benzoate which cause central nervous to work with highest effectiveness possible at a given time. Reduce sleepiness to a large degree. Take two tablets at one time.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] potent alcohol sobering effect
Cystamine

A substance functioning as a radioprotector, used to weaken the effects of radiation on the body. The radioprotective effect of cystamine is based on the ability to bind free radicals - ionised and excited molecules formed in tissues upon irradiation - as well as the ability of the drug to interact with certain enzymes and impart resistance to ionising radiation. The effects of cystamine do not counteract already accumulated radiation.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild dizziness
Sulfadimethoxine

Sulfanilamide medication, effective against gram-positive and gram-negative bacteria. It acts on pneumococci, streptococci, staphylococcus, E. coli, Klebsiella stick (Friedlander's stick), causative agents of dysentery; is less active with respect to the protein; is active against the trachoma virus (an infectious eye disease that can lead to blindness); It does not act on strains of bacteria resistant to other sulfanilamide preparations. Adverse effects include headaches, digestive disorders, skin rashes, fevers and leukopenia. The effects of the drug are long-lasting.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]HEALING:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Depletes 1.5%hp on use
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
Chlortetracycline

An antibiotic. Crystalline powder of golden yellow colour, bitter taste, soluble in water. This is one of the first open antibiotics (after penicillin).
 Chlorotetracycline hydrochloride has a bacteriostatic effect on gram-positive and gram-negative microbes, rickettsia and some large viruses.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] average increase in drowsiness
Etperazine

Tablets coated with a shell, containing 4.6 and 10 mg of perphenazine. The drug is a neuroleptic - an antipsychotic agent that provides antiallergic, sedative, miorelaxing, antiemetic, weak anticholinergic, hypotensive and hypothermic actions. The efficacy of Etperazine is due to the blockade of D2 receptors in the mesocortical and mesolimbic systems. Rarely used in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] anti-inflammatory
Cannabis joint

Known for their relaxing effects, joints are used by stalkers recreationally, especially those who frequent the Barrier or the Red Forest beyond it. Induces a soothing effect if combined with alcohol. Increases hunger.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] zone-produced
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
Axyltallisal "The Rebirth"

Warning! Do not use in combination with any other drug as this may prove lethal. This powerful mixture contained in a small syringe will make you lose consciousness. But when you wake up (if you wake up), you will feel reborn. Inject the syringe into your thigh when sitting down.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]HEALING:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Restores 22.5%hp/s, total 190%
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes temporary blackout
Tetanus vaccine

Tetanus vaccine is composed of inactivated tetanus toxin and is used to prevent an individual from contracting tetanus. Tetanus, also known as lockjaw, is a disease caused by the bacteria Clostridium tetani which enter the body through open wounds and release a poison called tetanospasmin. Tetanus is a potentially deadly disease because the poison attacks the nervous system blocking nerve signals from the spinal cord to and from the muscles. Animals and mutants alike are prone to carry Clostridium tetani which can be transferred through bites. Injection of inactivated toxin enhances your immunological system and can lead to several positive side-effects. Moreover, this vaccine has been supplemented with several additional anti-toxins making it usable for purposes other than preventing contraction of tetanus.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]HEALING:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Restores 0.06%hp/s, total 26.5%
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
Potassium iodide

A pharmacological compound, used in the Zone as a cheap means of countering the effects of radiation on the body. Causes numerous side effects, notably gastrointestinal tract blistering, numbness to pain and dysfunction of the thyroid gland.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]HEALING:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Depletes 8%hp on use
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild dizziness
Marijuana

Self-grown cannabis. Smoking it is a popular pastime, especially among Freedomers who've served at the Barrier. Marijuana bags can be bought here and there in the Zone. Some believe that the drug helps retain a balance of the mind.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (prolonged inhalation)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] potent alcohol sobering effect
